description: Commutes, coffee runs, park walks and casual days at the office are better in comfy shoes. Premium full-grain leather and recycled Cordura® canvas are durable enough to kick it in your closet for more than a few seasons. Grippy rubber soles keep you upright when things get slippery.Durable and attractive upper is made with premium full-grain leather and 100% recycled Cordura canvas.Breathable mesh lining is 50% recycled PET.Rubber outsole adds traction.
name: Timberland Groveton Leather Chukkas - Men's
